content.title: 🚀 300% FUNDED! LET’S CELEBRATE TOGETHER! ⛳️🎉
content.creator:
TeeBoxx
March 19, 2025
content.content:
Wow… 300% funded and counting! This is absolutely unreal, and it’s all because of YOU—our incredible backers.
When I first started working on TeeBoxx, I knew golfers needed something better, smarter, and built for the course—but I never imagined the overwhelming support we’d receive. Seeing this community come together to bring TeeBoxx to life has been nothing short of amazing. THANK YOU!
Now, let’s keep this momentum going and spread the word! 💥
📲 SHARE YOUR SUPPORT & GET FEATURED!
1️⃣ Take a screenshot of your TeeBoxx backing confirmation 📸
2️⃣ Post it on your Instagram Story
3️⃣ Tag us [@TeeBoxx_Golf] so we can REPOST & celebrate with you!
Every share helps us bring TeeBoxx to even more golfers! Let’s keep making history together. More exciting updates are coming soon!
Grateful for every one of you,
🏌️ Matt Albee
Founder, TeeBoxx 🚀

content.title: 🚀 250% FUNDED!
content.creator:
TeeBoxx
March 11, 2025
content.content:
🚀 250% FUNDED! THANK YOU! 🙌⛳️
Hey everyone,
I’m absolutely blown away… TeeBoxx is now 250% FUNDED! 🎉 This started as just an idea, something I believed could truly enhance the golf experience, and now—because of YOU—it’s becoming a reality.
From the bottom of my heart, thank you for backing TeeBoxx and believing in this vision. Your support means everything, and we’re just getting started!
Now, let’s keep the momentum going! If you’re as excited as we are, help us spread the word!
📲 HOW TO SHARE:
1️⃣ Screenshot your TeeBoxx backing confirmation 📸
2️⃣ Post it on your Instagram Story 📢
3️⃣ Tag us [@TeeBoxx_Golf] so we can repost & celebrate with you!
Every single share helps us reach more golfers and bring TeeBoxx to even more people! Let’s make this HUGE! 🚀
Thank you again for being part of this journey. More exciting updates are coming soon!
🏌️ Matt Albee
Founder, TeeBoxx ⛳️

comments.text: Congratulations!!! Really excited to try the product.
Thank you Norm! If you are willing to share a story on instagram and tag us that would be much appreciated. Looking forward to you trying out the TeeBoxx!
So does this mean we can get them earlier? 🤔🤔
Hi Brian, we appreciate your support. We are aiming to deliver them in June. We will keep you updated if it happens earlier! 👍

content.title: Campaign Fully Funded!!!
content.creator:
TeeBoxx
March 8, 2025
content.content:
🎉 We Did It! Campaign Fully Funded! 🎉 
Dear Backers,
Wow! We are thrilled, humbled, and beyond grateful to announce that our Kickstarter campaign has officially reached its funding goal. Thanks to each and every one of you, our vision is now becoming a reality!  The campaign has three more weeks, and plenty of incentives still available.  We would be incredibly grateful if you could help spread the word to your community of golfers.  
With immense gratitude, The TeeBoxx Team
